title: Is it worth it to get an iPhone even if I don't have any other Apple products? - Quora

response.answer_text: Apple products work really well together and having more Apple products mean you get more value out of them then owning them alone. However, most people who own Apple products own only one Apple product, the iPhone, and no others. So there is definitely value to getting an iPhone for those people.  Ultimately, it's worth it if it does what you need it to do. If an iPhone appears to meet those needs, then it definitely is worth it.

NO,its not at all necessary to have other apple products to get the most out of ur iPhone.iTunes is the most important software to transfer data from laptop,desktops to iPhone,and iTunes is also available on windows.There are some other functionalities that iPhone is capable of performing when it gets integrated in a pool of other apple products,like syncing iMessages,notes,music library,.... but all these(small)things don't stop us from buying an iPhone.
